channel.title: Cracked client 1.4
channel.description: Has anyone heard any news on a cracked client for 1.4 if so, link me?

item.title: Cracked client 1.4
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:7, topic:388970”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=484789.msg3554684#msg3554684 date=1301791656]
I have a cracked client that works instantly on any update (: Goto www.minecraft.net and click the big button that says “Buy now”

Seriously though, the game is definitely worth buying…
[/quote]
Agree’d but some people have the issue of their parents not letting them buy it on their debit/credit card even when trying to give them the cash (prob i had at first, until i went and got a pre-paid visa).[/quote]
Yea, I got one of those money pack things, and used it to buy it.

Read full topic

item.title: Cracked client 1.4
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

B2300 T4nk:

Coon your client doesn’t update.

I have tested it already, and it worked fine for me, using the Login Soharuda2 (checking with hasPaid page on minecraft to be sure) and it updated just fine on an un-paid account. Try deleting your bin folder.

EDIT: So you can see for yourself that the account name is not paid
http://www.minecraft.net/haspaid.jsp?user=soharuda2

I will even make a video of proof if necessary.

Read full topic
